mapper.select: SELECT T1.level, T2.name FROM ( SELECT @r AS _id, (SELECT @r := parent_id FROM project WHERE id = _id) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS level FROM (SELECT @r := #{id}, @l := 0) vars, project h WHERE @r <> 0) T1 JOIN project T2 ON T1._id = T2.id ORDER BY T1.level DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (`id`, `name`, `parent_id`, `position`) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{parentId}, (select position from (select IFNULL((select position from project where parent_id = #{parentId} order by position limit 1)-1, 888)position)position) )
mapper.update: update project set position = position -1 where parent_id = (select parent_id from (select parent_id from project where id = #{destId})a) and position < (select position from (select position from project where id = #{destId})b); update project set position = (select position from (select (select position from project where id = #{destId})-1 position) position), parent_id = (select parent_id from (select parent_id from project where id = #{destId}) parent_id) where id = #{id};

update project set position = position +1 where parent_id = (select parent_id from (select parent_id from project where id = #{destId})a) and position > (select position from (select position from project where id = #{destId})b); update project set position = (select position from (select (select position from project where id = #{destId})+1 position) position), parent_id = (select parent_id from (select parent_id from project where id = #{destId}) parent_id) where id = #{id};
